com.karuslabs.commons.core.test

Class XMLResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
      • com.karuslabs.commons.core.test.XMLResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public class XMLResource
extends org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
    Provides classes with a XML test resource. Meant for testing purposes and should never be used in production code.

    • Constructor Summary

        public XMLResource()

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public XMLResource load(File file,
                        String schemaPath)
        Loads the XML document from the specified file using the specified XML schema. Not providing a schema causes this to build the document without validation.
        Parameters:
        file - The XML file
        schemaPath - The schema path
        Returns:
        this

      • load

        public XMLResource load(InputStream stream,
                        String schemaPath)
        Loads the XML Document from the specified inputstream using the specified XML schema. Not providing a schema causes this to build the document without validation.
        Parameters:
        stream - The inputstream
        schemaPath - The schema path
        Returns:
        this

        Returns:
